channel.title: Winning Isn't Everything with Chris McCausland and Dianne Buswell
channel.description:
Friends, dance partners, and Strictly Come Dancing 2024 winners Chris and Dianne are having a weekly catch up and they would love you to drop in.
Talking all things life and Strictly… and with a lot of nonsense thrown in as well. Dianne wants to understand the world a bit more. Chris just wants to moan about it...
Get in touch with the show and send us your questions to winningisnteverythingpod@gmail.com
Follow us @winningisnteverythingpod
A 'Keep It Light Media' Production

Friends, dance partners, and Strictly Come Dancing 2024 winners Chris and Dianne are having a weekly catch up and they would love you to drop in.


Talking all things life and Strictly… and with a lot of nonsense thrown in as well.

Dianne wants to understand the world a bit more. Chris just wants to moan about it...


Get in touch with the show and send us your questions to winningisnteverythingpod@gmail.com

item.title: EP2: The Face Pube
item.description:
Welcome!! Strictly Come Dancing 2024 winners and dance partners Chris McCausland and Dianne Buswell are having a weekly catch up on this, their new podcast, and they would love you to drop in...
Talking all things life and Strictly… and with a lot of nonsense thrown in as well. Dianne wants to understand the world a bit more. Chris just wants to moan about it.
In this episode we discuss unfortunate facial hair fails, Dianne and the Strictly team playing Traitors on tour with the other dancers, and Chris and Dianne talk about their dance partnership on the show.
Please subscribe, follow, and leave us a review. xXx
Get in touch with the show and your questions in to winningisnteverythingpod@gmail.com
INSTAGRAM: @winningisnteverythingpod X / TWITTER:
A Keep It Light Media Production Sales and general enquiries: Hello@keepitlightmedia.cpm Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: EP1: The Strictly Come Dancing Catch-up Special
item.description:
Welcome!! Strictly Come Dancing 2024 winners and dance partners Chris McCausland and Dianne Buswell are having a weekly catch up on this, their new podcast, and they would love you to drop in...
Talking all things life and Strictly… and with a lot of nonsense thrown in as well. Dianne wants to understand the world a bit more. Chris just wants to moan about it.
For the first ever episode they discuss what they've been up to over Xmas and New Years since they last saw each other. And then go through the Strictly final and their incredible route to get the and become crowned champions. Enjoy!
Please subscribe, follow, and leave us a review. xXx
Get in touch with the show and your questions in to winningisnteverythingpod@gmail.com
INSTAGRAM: @winningisnteverythingpod X / TWITTER:
A Keep It Light Media Production Sales and general enquiries: Hello@keepitlightmedia.cpm
